rows.label: bf06120170_0010
rows.name:
This means...someone
must have revived it.

rows.label: bf06120170_0030
rows.name:
And you're saying that someone was
Zeke's home country, Luxuria?

rows.label: bf06120170_0050
rows.name:
To ensure that none
approach the World Tree.

rows.label: bf06120170_0060
rows.name:
The Great Void was created to prevent
repeating the tragedy of the Holy Grail War.

rows.label: bf06120170_0070
rows.name:
It's impressive they
could do such a thing.

rows.label: bf06120170_0080
rows.name: As I've said, mankind is regressing.

rows.label: bf06120170_0090
rows.name:
Something that can cancel Serpent's
mission exists in Luxuria.

rows.label: bf06120170_0100
rows.name:
It's called the Sanctus Chain, and
it's guarded by the royal family.

rows.label: bf06120170_0120
rows.name:
I've prepared the diplomatic papers.
Going to Eden was your goal, wasn't it?

rows.label: bf06120170_0130
rows.name:
Metsu and his ilk will surely seek
the Sanctus Chain for themselves.

rows.label: bf06120170_0140
rows.name:
I would ask you to reach Eden before they
do, and inform me of what you find there.

rows.label: bf06120170_0150
rows.name:
Do it as a favor for a
once-foolish old man.

rows.label: bf06120170_0160
rows.name:
And so that people may have a
future in this dying world...
